descriptionHtml:
Mod: Unified Smithing Mod
Game: TES V: Skyrim
Author: *STK*Disturbed
Date: 2/15/12 
************************************************************************
CONTENTS 
************************************************************************
1. Information on the Mod
2. Installation
3. Version History
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
5. Copy Status and Credits
6. Contact Info
************************************************************************
1. INFORMATION ON THE MOD 
************************************************************************
This mod sets a stantard for all the major cities. This effects the cities of Whiterun, Markarth, Riften, Solitude, and Whindhelm.(Whiterun has the skyforge and the other station and they have all the same tools at each.)
Each Smithing station in each location includes these tools: Smelter, Tanning Rack, Wood Cutting Block, Grinding Wheel, Forge, and a Workbench. Some Cities already have a smelter, so i moved the smelter closer to the smithing station, However in WindHelm i left the smelter in the same position because it was close and was positioned perfectly and did not need reajustments.

************************************************************************
2. Installation 
************************************************************************
This is the easy one, just click the green subscribe button :D
************************************************************************
3. Version History 
************************************************************************
V 1.0 2/15/12 Initial release. 
************************************************************************
4. Conflicts, Known Issues, and Troubleshooting
************************************************************************
I did internal testing to check for various bugs and corrected all that I found. if you have a bug please see number 7. However the Open Cities mod did cause some problems. it made loading custom geometries not load at all, to fix this turn off Open Cities mod, run the game fast travel to another city then exit and now you are free to run Open Cities mod again.
************************************************************************
5. Copy Status and Credits 
************************************************************************
Credits: Bethesda for the awsome open source game we modders can pick at. Another Thanks is to Vexare, he makes all my mod preview jpegs. He does great work and so for that I thank him.

Copy Status: Public Domain may modify my mod, repack, or even include my mod in their own mod if you inform me through email and give credit to me in the credits for the mod.
************************************************************************
6. Contact Info
*************************************************************************
Any questions, Bugs, future mod ideas, or permission to use my mod in a project email me with this address
EMAIL: Kasey91@gmail.com
*************************************************************************
********************************
author: Pastdark75
